goals__remit: Wavestone has a dedicated EU Advisory team, based in both Luxembourg and Brussels. Our team liaises on a regular basis with the EU institutions by carrying out evaluations, impact assessments and policy studies in various business sectors (energy, transport, justice, health, senior citizens, climate, etc.). We also provide technology and programme delivery services in several areas including home affairs, justice, transport and e-Government.
